name: The Sinking Castle
description:
The Sinking Castle

You wake up in the middle of a cursed collapsing castle, and you quickly realize that you have to save all the inhabitants of the fortress. Fortunately, ships come to your rescue! All you have to do now is collect the people and... throw them onto the ships, before the cursed castle swallows them whole.

Game produced for Godot Wild Jam #54

Theme: Curses

Wild Cards: Crumbling Location, Procedural Generation
